tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE error_timestamps (error_occurrence TIMESTAMP, correction_timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE error_occurrences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp_occurrence TIMESTAMP,
    error_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE error_corrections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp_correction TIMESTAMP,
    error_id INT,
    correction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE error_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_id INT,
    analysis_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE error_optimization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_id INT,
    optimization_notes TEXT
)
